info.author: Michael Sanders
info.description:
AutoPy is a simple, cross-platform GUI automation toolkit for Python. It
includes functions for controlling the keyboard and mouse, finding colors
and bitmaps on-screen, and displaying alerts -- all in a cross-platform,
efficient, and simple manner.

Fixed some of the pull requests from the github.
info.name: autoPyImage
info.platform: Mac OS X 10.5+,X11 with XTest Extension,Windows
info.summary: A simple, cross-platform GUI automation toolkit for Python.
info.html_description:
AutoPy is a simple, cross-platform GUI automation toolkit for Python. It includes functions for controlling the keyboard and mouse, finding colors and bitmaps on-screen, and displaying alerts – all in a cross-platform, efficient, and simple manner.

Fixed some of the pull requests from the github.
